## ProcessManager.startAndWait() method

Starts a new process and wait until it finishes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startAndWait(opts: ProcessOpts): Promise<ProcessOutput>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  opts | ProcessOpts | Process options |
